info: This item is part of the <info>MOLLE gear system</info>.  It can be attached to <info>MOLLE carrying equipment</info>, such as a vest or a backpack.

This item is a decorative piece for the <info>MOLLE gear system</info>.  It can be attached to <info>MOLLE carrying equipment</info>, such as a vest or a backpack.  It does not provide any benefit beyond asserting you into the empty world.
This item has the right dimensions to be stored in <info>file compartments</info>.
This item has the right dimensions to be stored in <info>credit and ID card compartments</info>
